data.address: Description 9) All That Part  and  Parcel Of Commercial Shop No.108/2 Min Measuring 12.6 Sq. Yards, Situated At Darzian Gali Patiala In The Name Of Punjab Singh S/O Late Sh. Avtar Singh Vide Sale Deed No. 4059 Dated 10.06.2016 Registered Before Sub Registrar District Patiala. Property Is Bounded As Under: North: Shop Of Tarvinder Kaur, South: Shops Of Devi Datta  and  Iqbal Singh, East:- Property Of Gori Mal  and  Changa Mal, West:-Road Province/State : Punjab City/Town : Patiala Area/Town : Patiala Cantt
